title: Love Drunk
description: One month, I fell for him.Two, I was a goner.Three, I was a daydreamer.But by the fourth, it was a nightmare.Everything came in beats.Beat one—fantasy.Beat two—admission.Beat three—love.But it’s the fourth beat that completely ruined me.Beat.Beat.Beat.With a shattered heart. He was my nightmare.
author: T.L.  Smith
